[/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” hover_enabled=”0″ z_index_tablet=”500″ use_border_color=”off”]

Tyler Willgoos, Account Manager North Carolina

Tyler Willgoos graduated from Endicott College in 2017 with a Bachelor of Science in Environmental Science. Tyler started his post-college career working at a civil engineering firm where he headed a novel division of land survey using unmanned aerial drone systems. He currently leads the North Carolina Division of ClinLab and works with a wide variety of biotech and medical device companies in Research Triangle Park and greater NC.

Outside of ClinLab, Tyler enjoys spending a lot of time with his family, playing sports such as basketball and volleyball, and searching for the best sushi on the East Coast.

North Carolina Office

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
